tool.name: NoiseFilterSGolay
tool.description: Removes noise from profile spectra by using a Savitzky Golay filter. Requires uniform (equidistant) data.
tool.command:
NoiseFilterSGolay
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_threads: -threads $param_threads #end if #if $param_algorithm_frame_length: -algorithm:frame_length $param_algorithm_frame_length #end if #if $param_algorithm_polynomial_order: -algorithm:polynomial_order $param_algorithm_polynomial_order #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_version: -version "$adv_opts.param_version" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_processOption: -processOption #if " " in str($adv_opts.param_processOption): "$adv_opts.param_processOption" #else $adv_opts.param_processOption #end if #end if #if $adv_opts.param_log: -log "$adv_opts.param_log" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_debug: -debug $adv_opts.param_debug #end if #if $adv_opts.param_no_progress: -no_progress #end if #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #if $adv_opts.param_test: -test #end if #end if

param.name: param_threads
param.label: Sets the number of threads allowed to be used by the TOPP tool

param.name: param_algorithm_frame_length
param.label: The number of subsequent data points used for smoothing
param.help:
(-frame_length)
This number has to be uneven. If it is not, 1 will be added

param.name: param_algorithm_polynomial_order
param.label: Order or the polynomial that is fitted

param.name: param_version
param.label: Version of the tool that generated this parameters file

param.name: param_processOption
param.label: Whether to load all data and process them in-memory or whether to process the data on the fly (lowmemory) without loading the whole file into memory first

param.name: param_log
param.label: Name of log file (created only when specified)

param.name: param_no_progress
param.label: Disables progress logging to command line

param.name: param_test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

tool.help:
Removes noise from profile spectra by using a Savitzky Golay filter. Requires uniform (equidistant) data.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_NoiseFilterSGolay.html
